main event: A UFO was observed by multiple witnesses near a highway in Newburg, Missouri on May 3, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as round, approximately 80 feet in diameter, and had a bright light in the center surrounded by smaller lights.,Witnesses observed the object for about 15 minutes while it hovered at a low level above the trees.,The object made no sound during the observation.,At one point, the central light went dark and the object appeared to pulse dimly.,The UFO accelerated rapidly and disappeared from sight when it took off.
sighted object: a round UFO with bright lights
witness description: David Eckert and a number of other witnesses
